text: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

translation.en: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet
translation.id: Dan ceritakanlah (Muhammad), kisah Musa di dalam Kitab (Alquran). Dia benar benar orang yang terpilih, seorang rasul dan nabi
